title: Keto Diet: 100 Low Carb Recipes for Weight Loss
description: Losing the extra pounds is now an easy and healthy task that you can check off your to-do list, all with the help of the keto diet! A revolutionary way of eating, focusing on consuming high-fat foods and avoiding carbohydrates, the keto diet is surely efficient. However, finding the right meal plan for your personality, schedule and tastes that can also follow the keto rules may not seem very easy. Or is it? Well, author Gabriel Kellison has put together a wonderful keto cookbook that offers 100 different lunch, dinner and snack choices for those who have embarked on the keto journey.Take a sneak peek at the 100 keto recipes of author Gabriel Kellison!Chicken, meatballs and bread, every essential recipe is included in this amazing book containing no less than 100 delicious meal options that will amaze even the pickiest foodie. And donâ€™t the food is great, but it also follows the exact indications of the keto diet, so you can lose weight while eating what you love!
author: Gabriel Kellison
